div.p: Please remember to check the Friday Folder each week for our Principal's Newsletter and other important announcements.

a.title: Go to comments for Friday Folder
Subscribe to RSS Feed - Headlines Rotator 657px X 242px
a.span: Subscribe to RSS Feed - Headlines Rotator 657px X 242px

span.a: George White - 6th Grade Teen Center CANCELLED
(Approx. start time) Board of Education Meeting - VIRTUAL (REVISED)
Meadowbrook Idol (at Pascack Valley High School) CANCELLED

span.strong: The Hillsdale School District is pleased to announce that it will host an Integrated Preschool Program for
the 2020-2021 school year. Applications are now available for the program.

strong.a: Please Click Here for More Information.

a.title: Go to comments for INTEGRATED PRE-SCHOOL -20-21
Go to comments for School Health-Related Closure Preparedness Plan

h4.strong: Due to the Executive Order from Governor Murphy, The Hillsdale Schools will be closed as long as the Order remains in effect. All co-curricular activities are canceled until further notice. The return date to school may change depending upon the ongoing societal impact of the Coronavirus. Please be safe and stay healthy. We will get through this together!

a.title: Go to comments for Schools Closed Corona

span.h3: Please view the letter from the Superintendent's office regarding Kindergarten registration

a.title: Go to comments for Kindergarten Registration Announcement

p.span: Please click on the link below for information regarding the water testing completed at each of the Hillsdale Schools

a.title: Go to comments for Water Testing Results

span.span: The Hillsdale Board of Education is in the process of contracting again with the A.C.E. Program sponsored by the River Vale Educational Fund for Before and After School Care for the 2019-20 school year. Registration Packet 19-20

strong.span: Please click on the link for access to the registration packet:

div.span: Also, we encourage you to visit A.C.E. website at: www.rvedfund.org for more information.

a.title: Go to comments for Before and After Care 2019-2020

span.strong: The Hillsdale School District is pleased to announce that it will host an Integrated Preschool Program for
the 2019-2020 school year. Applications are now available for the program.

strong.a: Please click here for more information.

a.title: Go to comments for Integrated Preschool Program

h1.a: Click Here for the District Standardized Assessments

a.title: Go to comments for District Standardized Assessments
